data.name: Sanctum 2 Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Want even more Sanctum 2 content? The Sanctum 2 Season Pass unlocks 4 massive DLC-packs, each adding a new environment with a set of maps and accompanying weapons, towers and perks! Buy a season pack today and get all four downloadable content packs for the price of three -- a 25% savings.
All Season Pass content is currently available and all content is available as individual purchases as well.

The DLC included in the Sanctum 2 Season Pass are the following:
  • Road to Elysion
  • Ruins of Brightholme
  • The Pursuit
  • The Last Stand

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equal at 1.6GHz or better
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9.0c-compatible, SM 3.0-compatible
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:2 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 8
  • Processor:QuadCore 2.0 GHz +
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9.0c-compatible, SM 3.0-compatible, 512MB VRAM+; NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS or better
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:4 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
